title: Diagnose and fix complete mobile functionality failure in Version 202

requirements.text: Investigate and fix critical JavaScript errors preventing the entire application from loading or functioning on mobile devices by examining browser console logs, service worker registration, and main bundle loading
acceptanceCriteria: Application loads successfully on mobile browsers (iOS Safari, Chrome Android)
No critical JavaScript errors in mobile browser console
Main React application renders and mounts correctly
Service worker registers without errors

requirements.text: Fix Internet Identity authentication flow for mobile browsers, ensuring the redirect URL handling works correctly and users can complete login on mobile devices
acceptanceCriteria: Login button responds to touch on mobile
Internet Identity redirect completes successfully
User is authenticated and redirected back to app after login
Authentication state persists correctly on mobile

requirements.text: Verify and fix touch event handlers across all interactive elements including buttons, cards, navigation links, video controls, and dialog overlays to ensure they respond properly to mobile touch inputs
acceptanceCriteria: All buttons respond to tap/touch events
Navigation menu opens and closes on mobile
Cards and content are tappable
Video player controls work with touch
Dialog/modal overlays respond correctly to touch

requirements.text: Fix mobile viewport rendering issues including proper scaling, scroll behavior, and layout overflow that may be preventing content from displaying correctly on mobile screens
acceptanceCriteria: Page renders at correct mobile viewport dimensions
Content is not zoomed or cut off
Scrolling works smoothly vertically and horizontally where appropriate
No horizontal overflow causing unwanted side-scrolling

requirements.text: Test and fix service worker caching strategy on mobile browsers to ensure proper asset loading, offline functionality, and cache updates without blocking app initialization
acceptanceCriteria: Service worker installs and activates successfully on mobile
Cached assets load correctly
App works in offline mode on mobile
Service worker updates do not break app functionality

requirements.text: Add comprehensive mobile device debugging capability including error logging, network request monitoring, and device information display to identify root causes of mobile failures
acceptanceCriteria: Detailed error logs accessible on mobile devices
Network requests and failures are logged
Device information (browser, OS, viewport) is captured
Debugging information can be exported or viewed in-app

constraints: Must maintain compatibility with existing Internet Identity authentication system
Cannot modify backend/main.mo or backend actor logic
Must preserve all existing feature functionality while fixing mobile issues
Service worker modifications must not break desktop browser functionality
nonGoals: Adding new features or functionality beyond mobile bug fixes
Redesigning UI components or layout structure
Changing authentication provider from Internet Identity
Implementing native mobile apps or React Native
